channel.title: Productions on Meritocracia y redistribución
channel.description: Recent content in Productions on Meritocracia y redistribución

item.title: Contact
item.description: if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman") #**ESTO SE DEBE CORRER UNA SOLA VEZ** (!) ## Loading required package: pacman pacman::p_load(dplyr, sjlabelled,summarytools, ggplot2,ggExtra,lme4,texreg) popdata <- read_spss("https://jciturras.github.io/ayudantia-sol3051/data/popular2.sav") popdata<- popdata %>% dplyr::select(pupil,class,popular,sex,extrav,texp) popdata %>% filter(class %in% c(82,74,33)) %>% ggplot() + geom_density(aes(x = popular,fill=factor(class,levels = c(82,74,33))),alpha=0.3) + geom_vline(xintercept = mean(popdata$popular),color="red",linetype="dashed", size=1) + ylab("Densidad")+ xlab("Popularidad alumno") + scale_fill_discrete("ID Curso")+ theme_classic()+ theme(legend.position = "top") ->popdata ggsave(popdata,filename = "../output/images/popdata.png",device = "png",units = "cm",width = 25,height = 15)
